articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Congratulates to PM of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Congratulates to PM of Sao Tome and Principe
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a congratulatory message to Patrice Emery Trovoada upon his assumption of office as prime minister, head of the government of the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe.
					 In the belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger in the future, the message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the wellbeing of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 In the meantime, on the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Manuel Salvador dos Ramos upon his appointment as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Community of Sao Tome and Principe.

articles.title: Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Message from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Sunday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said:
					
					 I sent this message to Your Excellency on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of the great leader HE Kim Jong Il in reflection of the mind of the Syrian Arab people who are sharing sorrow with the friendly leadership and people of your country.
					
					 We will never forget the great line and role of HE Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the DPRK, who dedicated his all to the country and its people.
					
					 We will always remember HE Kim Jong Il as the great fighter, genuine patriot and the leader who protected the country and its people and the revolution.

articles.title: US Will Face DPRK's Toughest Counteraction: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
US Will Face DPRK's Toughest Counteraction: FM Spokesman
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Monday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the U.S. madcap "human rights" racket against the DPRK:
					 The U.S. has recently become all the more pronounced in its "human rights" offensive against the DPRK.
					
					 In the last one week alone, the U.S. secretary of State, the assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs, the assistant secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights and Labour, the "special envoy for human rights issue of North Korea" and the U.S. special representative for North Korea policy vied with each other to unhesitatingly let loose a string of invectives against the DPRK, taking issue with it over its "human rights issue".
					
					 The U.S. Department of State announced a detailed standard to provide funds to the anti-DPRK "human rights" organizations and the U.S. Congress adopted a "bill" calling on the administrator of the U.S. State Intelligence Agency and the U.S. secretary of State to spy on the internal affairs of the DPRK and gather information critical of it, becoming all the more undisguised in their moves to escalate confrontation with the latter over "human rights".
					
					 Such moves go to prove that the U.S. is regarding the "human rights" racket against the DPRK as a lever for bringing down its ideology and social system, politicizing it and stepping up it in a premeditated manner. 
					
					 These actions mean that the U.S. reneged on the September 19 joint statement of the six-party talks which calls for respect for sovereignty and peaceful coexistence between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is leaving no means untried to bring down the social system of the DPRK, the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula will completely lose its meaning.
					
					 The DPRK agreed on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula not to allow the U.S. to swallow it up but to have the nuclear threat of the U.S. to the DPRK defused and peace and security on the peninsula ensured. 
					
					 Now that the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. over human rights is high on the agenda, any dialogue on the nuclear issue is meaningless.
					
					 The U.S. is talking this or that about the release of Americans who had been detained in the DPRK. But the release was nothing but a cleaning work done by it to start confrontation with the U.S. over human rights, not to want dialogue with it.
					
					 In fact, the DPRK has more things to talk over human rights than the U.S.
					
					 It is the U.S. that is finding itself in a tight corner due to the disclosure of brutal tortures practiced by the CIA and the scandals of racial discrimination perpetrated by white policemen. It is again the U.S. and its lackeys who suffered shame while floating wild rumors about youngsters of the DPRK who returned home after being abducted by flesh traffickers.
					
					 This time U.S. Secretary of State Kerry made such disgusting gesture as openly praising a swindler, defector from the north, whom he has used for the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. This clearly proved that he is going reckless, keen on moves hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Former U.S. Secretary of State Powell was taken in by lies told by the CIA engrossed in gathering intelligence and inventing pretexts through tortures. But today Kerry is behaving like a fool, believing in the lies told by a "defector from the north."
					
					 The DPRK has already sent a video clip disclosing the true colors of the above-said swindler to Kerry through a relevant channel.
					
					 Washington's policy aimed to topple the social system of the DPRK over its "human rights issue" is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The U.S. will have to experience the toughest counteraction of the DPRK against its hostile policy towards the DPRK and be held wholly accountable for the derailing of the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: KCNA Issues Report to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
KCNA Issues Report to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a report on Monday on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The report deals with the facts that his revolutionary career and undying feats have been glorified as an eternal treasure of the nation.
					
					 The report says:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un wisely led the work to glorify the revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Jong Il forever, reflecting the revolutionary faith and will and ardent desire of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Over the last three years he published a great many famous works, thus indicating the way of accomplishing the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The 4th Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 5th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly decided to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK and the eternal chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the meetings also declared it as the supreme programme of the Party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was remodeled as a grand monument to the immortality of the leaders and his statues and the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il were erected on Mansu Hill and in different parts of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has remarkably cemented the single-minded unity left by Kim Jong Il as the most precious revolutionary legacy.
					
					 The organizational and ideological foundation of the party was firmly consolidated, the importance of the ideological work reaffirmed and reconfirmed and a landmark provided for an epochal turn in the ideological work with the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the WPK and the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the WPK as momentums.
					
					 The slogan of "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" has become the basic cornerstone of the activities of the WPK.
					
					 The love for the people has grown stronger as Kim Jong Un visited various parts of the country for field guidance hundreds of times.
					
					 A heyday has been ushered in increasing the military muscle true to the party's Songun revolutionary line.
					
					 Kim Jong Un visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on January 1, Juche 101 (2012) and declared his will to carry on the journey for Songun made by Kim Jong Il all his life.
					
					 He made sure that all companies and battalions turned into dear old homes of the service personnel and dear hometowns linked with the court of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Saying that a war is ignited without any declaration, he kindled the torch of the hot wind for intensifying training the way anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu and the brisk movement for becoming crackshots. 
					
					 The work for putting the national defense industry on a Juche-oriented, modern and IT basis has reached a new higher phase.
					
					 The historic March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK laid down a fresh strategic line on simultaneously developing the economic construction and building a nuclear force, making it possible to protect the independent dignity of Songun Korea forever and bring about a bigger leap forward and innovations in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set science and technology as one of the three pillars for building a thriving nation true to Kim Jong Il's intention and made the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century rage more furiously.
					
					 The successful launch of the Kwangmyongsong 3-2, the Juche-oriented satellite 100 per cent locally manufactured, on Dec. 12, 2012 helped further boost the position of the satellite manufacturer and launcher provided by Kim Jong Il with much effort.
					
					 Innovations were reported from the field of construction. They sparked an intensive drive on all fronts of the socialist construction.
					
					 The "speed on Masik Pass" and Korean speed were created and monumental structures including the Masikryong Ski Resort appeared as the icon of a highly civilized socialist nation true to Kim Jong Un's patriotic appeal.
					
					 Innovations were also effected in the sector of agriculture, the forefront for defending socialism and major thrust of the building of an economic power, history of big fish haul began in the seas of the country and a revolutionary turn is being brought about in land management.
					
					  The universal 12-year compulsory education was introduced on the basis of the party's noble outlook on the country, young generation and future and the drive for educating all the people to be well versed in science and technology is making dynamic progress.
					
					 The Moranbong Band is taking the lead in the general advance while demonstrating the rapid development of the Juche-oriented arts by carrying forward the tradition of making a radical turn in literature and arts in the 20th century.
					
					 DPRK players bagged more than 400 gold medals in 200 odd international games during the past three years and had the dignified DPRK's flags hoisted there.
					
					 Through the past three-year struggle, the service personnel and people powerfully demonstrated that Kim Jong Un's leadership is the lifeline of the Korean revolution and no force on earth can block the general advance of the DPRK following the road of independence, Songun and socialism, holding aloft the immortal flag of the sun.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues by Guinean President
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues by Guinean President
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A floral basket from Alpha Conde, president of the Republic of Guinea, was placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues by Overseas Korean
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues by Overseas Korean
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and an overseas Korean Monday laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They were members of the missions of the World Food Program, the World Health Organization, the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations and the United Nations Children's Fund here, Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK hero An Tong Su.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il. 
					 They were the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo, the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Benin, the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company, the Switzerland-Korea Committee, Marshal Yazov, former minister of Defence of the Soviet Union, Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the family of Zhou Wei who is a daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the family of Kim Chol, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, and the family of Kim Sun Ok, person related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.

articles.title: Youth and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youth and Students Meet
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of youth and students titled "We will be loyal down through generations" took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 At the meeting that started with narration and chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il", the immortal revolutionary hymn, performers recollected his revolutionary life.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, referred to the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il who trained the Korean youth to be a large unit of reliable political reserve forces to the party and successors to the revolution.
					
					 Speakers said that the torch of revolution handed by Kim Jong Il has been flaring up in the hearts of millions of young vanguard generation after generation and century after century.
					
					 They stressed that the love and trust by Kim Jong Il in youth are an essential source enabling them to make miracles and merits in every worksite for bringing about a great surge in the socialist construction.
					
					 They renewed their resolution to hold President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche generation after generation and accomplish the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause of Songun to the end, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, persons who had the honor of being received by Kim Jong Il and those related to his revolutionary activities, and other youth and students.

articles.title: Workers and Members of Trade Unions Meet
articles.content:
Workers and Members of Trade Unions Meet
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) met at the Central Hall of Workers Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They vowed to uphold with loyalty the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un while holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people.
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Putting forward workers as the core and vanguard unit of building a thriving nation, Kim Jong Il brightly indicated the road ahead of the GFTUK in each period of the developing revolution and led it to perform its honorable mission and duty, they said.
					
					 They pledged to bring into reality the lifelong desire and plan of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed the need to glorify for all ages the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The meeting was attended by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials and members of the GFTUK and other workers.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Commemorate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps (one individual and one sheet) to commemorate the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The individual stamp carries a picture of Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering crowd.
					
					 Seen on the sheet are letters "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and an overall view of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 The stamps make viewers recall the whole life of Kim Jong Il who led the Korean revolution always to victory by steadfastly inheriting the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and devoted his all to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Turning DPRK into Economic Giant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Turning DPRK into Economic Giant
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il (December 17), the people in the DPRK recollect with deep emotion the great feats he had performed for turning the country into an economic giant.
					 Kim Jong Il laid down the Juche-based economic construction line of simultaneously developing the light industry and agriculture while giving priority to the development of defence industry.
					
					 And he clearly indicated the orientation and ways for building an economic power, which suggested rapidly developing electricity, coal and metal industries and railway transport, doing double-cropping on a large scale, updating light industrial factories and paying preferential efforts to the production of basic consumer goods.
					
					 In June Juche 85 (1996) when giving field guidance to the Anbyon Youth Power Station near to completion, he praised the soldier-builders for having unfailingly carried out their supreme commander's order under the very difficult conditions. And he called their indomitable fighting traits the revolutionary soldier spirit, urging all the people to follow it.
					
					 Consequently, the spirit of Kanggye was created and a big production upsurge witnessed at the Songjin Steel Complex and the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Complex, bringing about an epochal turn in the building of an economic power.
					
					 Such signal achievements were made in the country as successful launch of earth satellites, large-scale land improvement, completion of Kaechon-Lake Thaesong and Paekma-Cholsan waterways and construction of many minor hydraulic power stations.
					
					 With a view to greeting the year 2012, the birth centenary of President Kim Il Sung, with eye-catching economic successes, Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex on Dec. 24, 2008 to kindle a torch of fresh revolutionary upsurge in the economic field.
					
					 Thanks to his ardent patriotism, energetic field guidance and devoted efforts, the DPRK grew stronger in national power. And the country could witness the establishment of Juche-based production systems of iron, fertilizer and vinalon President Kim Il Sung desired so much and greet a history of industrial revolution in the new century through a drive of breaking through the cutting edge.
					
					 His plan for building an economic power is now creditably carried into practice by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was interviewed by KCNA on Monday with the approach of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il represented a shining history in which he devoted his all to the work for national reunification, Jo said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il alleviated the sorrow over division pent up among the Koreans for more than half a century with the warm rays of the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 He hewed out the arduous road, always going in simple jumper with the ardent and patriotic will to hand over a reunified country to the Koreans. 
					
					 It was the greatest exploit he performed for the nation that he ushered in a new era of independent national reunification with the patriotic and great courageous decision and steadfast will to reunify the country. 
					
					 The history does not know such peerless patriot as Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The life of the great man who made indefatigable efforts for the country and the nation is always remembered by the Koreans. 
					
					 Heard from the "plaza of people's mindset" where people from all walks of life gathered are voices that Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il provided the firm foundation for national reunification and prosperity of the nation and the great feats performed by him for the sacred work for national reunification will be conveyed to posterity.
					
					 The profound reverence of south Korean people for the peerless great man can be felt everywhere in cities, farms and fishery villages. 
					
					 It is the true hearts of the Koreans to revere and follow the fatherly leader irrespective of job, residence, political view and religious belief. 
					
					 The undying leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for national reunification will always be lauded.

articles.title: DPRK Bags at Least 120 Gold Medals at 2014 Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Bags at Least 120 Gold Medals at 2014 Int'l Games
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the DPRK have bagged at least 120 gold medals at 70-odd international games this year.
					 In particular, the DPRK proved remarkably successful in the weightlifting event.
					
					 It topped the country standings of the 2014 World Weightlifting Championship and won more than 20 gold medals for the year. 
					
					 Its weightlifters renewed world records one after another and one of them set three new records at the 17th Asian Games, while some emerged world and Asian junior and juvenile weightlifting champions.    Om Yun Chol and Kim Un Guk were recognized as world strongmen in 56kg and 62kg weightlifting categories.
					
					 The DPRK also showed good results in the football event. 
					
					 The women team defeated its Japanese rival, world cup holder, in the finals at the 17th Asian Games, emerging the three-time winner in the wake of the 14th and 15th Asiads. The DPRK came first at the AFC U-16 Championship and the U-14 Girls Football Regional Championship.
					
					 Besides, the country obtained a lot of gold medals in other international games.
					
					 Yang Kyong Il, Ri Se Gwang and Hong Un Jong took the titles at the 2014 World Wrestling Championships and the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships and Pak Jong Ju, Ri Se Ung and Kim Son Hyang snatched gold medals at the 2nd Youth Olympic Games.
					
					 The DPRK athletes bagged gold medals in table-tennis, marathon, shooting, aero model, parachute, boxing, judo and other events, too. 
					
					 Its Taekwon-Do players won gold medals twice those of last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Sun of Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Sun of Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- It is the immortal patriotic feats in the national history that leader Kim Jong Il put forward the idea of By Our Nation Itself as an invincible banner of the movement of Korea's reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself is the brilliant embodiment of Kim Jong Il's transparent idea of national independence and the crystal of his noble idea of patriotism, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself was propounded thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, who firmly established the Juche-based principle for the cause of national reunification, foiled the challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad with the might of national independence and promoted unity and reunification.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself is the proud word in the June 15 era of reunification which comprehends the Juche-based viewpoints of nation and reunification of Kim Jong Il, the supreme personifier and representative of the spirit of national independence.
					
					 After the historic June 15 joint declaration, the main spirit of the idea of By Our Nation Itself, was published, there were full of ardent reverence for him throughout the country. The south Korean people from all walks of life are permeated with the "hot wind of Kim Jong Il" boundlessly revering for him. 
					
					 It is a unanimous will of all Koreans at home and abroad to put forward the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the results of his patriotic will, as immutable programmes and accomplish the cause of independent reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: S. Korea Assailed for Its Anti-DPRK Confrontational Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korea Assailed for Its Anti-DPRK Confrontational Remarks
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive said in her speech at an international meeting held in Seoul accused the DPRK, terming its just measure for bolstering the nuclear deterrence the "biggest factor of uneasiness and serious threat" and "contradictory policy".
					 Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, shouted himself hoarse that it is necessary to "pressurize someone to lead to change in case of need", blustering that it is the "internal contradiction including human rights issue" and the "north's nuclear capacity is very dangerous".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is something unprecedented in history that the south Korean puppet group is kicking up a provocative farce against the DPRK day after day over its nuclear issue and "human rights" issue whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the puppet forces to go madder with their anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 It is worth recalling who was responsible for the ferry Sewol sinking accident which took the lives of hundreds of children. It was none other than the cold-blooded chief executive of south Korea who cold-shouldered the bereaved families and angry public. It was again chief executive who turned south Korea into tundra of worst human rights in the world through the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the puppet group is talking volumes about someone's nonexistent "human rights" issue, far from repenting of its crimes against humanity. It is nothing but desperate writhing of a poor psychopath seized with despair.
					
					 The puppet group would be well advised to bear in mind that the endless stream of malignant invectives let loose by it would be nothing but sharp axes to drop on its necks.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Assails Regime for Concealing Truth behind Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Assails Regime for Concealing Truth behind Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- An editorial disclosing the moves of the south Korean puppet regime to cover up the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Dec. 12.
					 The editorial underlined the urgent need to disclose the truth behind the disaster and prevent its recurrence.
					
					 However, as far as the members of the ad hoc committee for probing truth behind the disaster recommended by the "Saenuri Party" are concerned, they are all politicians strong in their "pro-Park Geun Hye" colors, those who had censured the bereaved families' efforts for probing the truth, personages extremely inclined to conservatives and those who were once active during the past dictatorial regime, the editorial charged.
					
					 If the committee wavers and fails to properly probe the truth due to those without qualifications, the regime and the "Saenuri party" will be held wholly accountable for the tragedy, the editorial warned.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred on a chicken and duck farm in Ryangsan City, South Kyongsang Province, south Korea on Dec. 13, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Lots of chickens and ducks were buried and culled.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Censured for Encouraging Violence
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Censured for Encouraging Violence
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea released a statement on Dec. 11 in denunciation of the puppet prosecution's behavior of encouraging violence.
					 That day the puppet prosecution authorities stormed the office of the Solidarity to search for personal belongings of Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired.
					
					 Earlier, conservatives let a student commit violence against Hwang and Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S.
					
					 The statement denounced the prosecution for suppressing victims and encouraging the rampage of conservative forces, far from punishing those involved in the violence little short of terrorism.
					
					 Censuring the action taken by the prosecution, the statement urged it to search the houses of those involved in the violence to probe the truth behind it.
					
					 It termed the action an undisguised revelation of the ulterior purpose of the Park Geun Hye regime to suppress even an attempt to know better about the north by invoking the "Security Law" and a reckless act of infringing upon the freedom of expression and bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It demanded the prosecution stop its unjust investigation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Searching Offices of Reunification Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Searching Offices of Reunification Organization
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration on Dec. 11 condemned the puppet group for searching offices of the organization, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 That day the fascist police searched the home of Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired, and offices of the South Side Committee and the Seoul Headquarters, taking issue with Hwang and Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., over their lecture at Jogye Temple in Seoul.
					
					 Enraged by this, the committee held a press conference before its office in Jongro District, Seoul where the police were keen on searching.
					
					 The committee protested against the search made by the police for the mere reason that the lecture of Hwang and Sin was sponsored by the committee.
					
					 The Solidarity for Progress in a statement denounced the present regime for its frantic suppression of the reunification movement organizations and officials through the racket of "eliminating followers of the north".

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Discloses US Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Discloses US Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The United States set up torture rooms in different parts of the world and has committed human rights abuses, according to the south Korean KBS on Dec. 11.
					 CIA has its secret prisons running in nine countries including Afghanistan and Iraq.
					
					 The CIA spent 81 million dollars for developing brutal torture techniques.
					
					 The broadcasting said that the U.S., in fact, operated the "world-wide torture network", adding that the "U.S. is in deep agony with the disclosure of tortures" and the "U.S. government is hit hard from all sides".

articles.title: US Paper on Encroachment on Freedom of Speech in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Paper on Encroachment on Freedom of Speech in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Washington Post on Dec. 11 reported that the freedom of speech is being encroached upon in south Korea.
					 The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea is opting for taking actions against media releasing reports unfavorable to it, the paper said.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is a daughter of Park Chung-Hee who wrested power through a military coup, it noted, adding the political freedom of citizens including the freedom of speech was suppressed by the past military dictatorial regimes.
					
					 It recalled that media persons of south Korea were indicted as they reported about documents on tendency of Jong Yun Hoe which was worked out at the chief secretary room for official discipline of Chongwadae and asserted that he had great influence on the state affairs directly linked with Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Saying that a media person was indicted for raising skepticism about what Park Geun Hye did right after the occurrence of the ferry Sewol accident, it noted these facts go to prove what type chief executive she is.

articles.title: Lecture Given by Chongryon
articles.content:
Lecture Given by Chongryon
 Tokyo, December 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- A lecture was given by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the lecture were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors and directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, permanent advisor and director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairpersons and officials of Chongryon Headquarters in Kanto area and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The attendants heard the video lecture "Son of People".
					
					 The video showed the noble life of Kim Jong Il who had warm love for the people and devoted his all to them to the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Held by Chongryon
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Held by Chongryon
 Tokyo, December 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was held by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos showing his revolutionary feats.
					
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairpersons, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors and directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, permanent advisor and director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon and chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters in Kanto area went round the exhibition. 
					
					 They looked back on the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who made ceaseless journeys for field guidance, always going in simple jumper till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Koreans in China Honor Memory of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in China Honor Memory of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a memorial service of Koreans in China at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were members of the Zhongnan Regional Association and the Beijing City Branch of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Then followed a seminar on exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers lauded him for performing great exploits on behalf of the times and history by dedicating himself to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people throughout his revolutionary life.
					
					 Praising him as the greatest man in history, they said:
					
					 He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification and led all Koreans along the patriotic road. His undying exploits will shine forever.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Korean in US
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Korean in US
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted on its website an article written by Kim Suk, a Korean in the U.S., under the title of "In recollection of exploits performed by Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" on Dec. 12.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK is now registering leap forward and innovations in every place and the foundation of such change was provided by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He built Songun Korea of Juche and defended its sovereignty without an inch of concession and vacillation.
					
					 He bolstered up the national defense industry despite the threat of attack from the imperialist brutes. 
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and military power, hewing out the rugged path of standing up against the U.S. persistent policy for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 Even when socialist countries collapsed and imperialists got undisguised in their threat of invasion, he led the country and its people along the road of victory with his clairvoyant wisdom and far-sighted vision.
					
					 He comprehensively systemized the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed it in depth.
					
					 He brought about a fresh development in all fields of arts including drama, movie, music and fine art.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who was well versed in cutting edge science brought about rapid progress in the fields of national defense industry, light industry and ultra-modern science in a short span of time.
					
					 He devoted himself to the country's prosperity and people's security.
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists was entirely ascribable to his wise leadership.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating only victory and honor under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the basis of leap forward brought about by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was posted by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia on its website on Dec. 10.
					 The work, made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that preserving the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction is the basic principle to be adhered to in accomplishing the socialist cause. It also indicates tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 The ideas and theories clarified by him in the work are indicating the road to socialism to the progressive people, the website said in the preface.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting, photo and book exhibition and film shows were held in Brazil, Denmark and Switzerland on Dec. 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Seen there were their works and other books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairman of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party said that Kim Jong Il foiled the vicious moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and safeguarded socialism and the national sovereignty, thus laying the everlasting foundation for the rosy future of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said Kim Jong Il made great contributions not only to the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea but to peace and security of Northeast Asia and, furthermore, the rest of the world.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party in Denmark noted Kim Jong Il's life was characterized by his devotion to the victory of the Korean revolution and happiness of Koreans and to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee lauded Kim Jong Il as the father who dedicated his all to the people's happiness until the last moments of his life,  regarding believing in the people as in Heaven as his motto.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Association
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Association
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK made public a statement on Dec. 8 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Recalling with deep emotion the feats performed by him on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise, the statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great successor to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician and invincible and iron-willed commander as he further developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by the President and pursued Songun politics, treasured sword for defending the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 He gave top priority to the issue of people's living in his thinking and activities and made long journeys for field guidance despite rain or snow.
					
					 It was thanks to his Songun politics that  socialist Korea had  access to powerful nuclear deterrence and could avert a war on the Korean Peninsula and, at the same time, open  a new chapter for national reunification through the adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving nation, true to the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries 
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Russia, Germany and Ethiopia on Dec. 4 and 5 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They were held by the Nakhodka Regional Committee of the "A Just Russia," the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany and an enterprise and a hospital of Ethiopia. 
					 The chairman of the regional committee of the Russian party said that Kim Jong Il, praised by all people, was the great son of the Korean people as he dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He pursued unique Songun politics, meeting the challenge of the U.S. and its followers and defending the sovereignty of the DPRK, the chairman noted, adding:
					
					 He led the Korean people to victory while firmly adhering to the line of independence despite the imperialists' ceaseless sanctions and blockade.
					
					 The chief of the German study group said that Kim Jong Il made undying contributions to the times and history through his tireless, energetic revolutionary activities.
					
					 The director of the Ethiopian hospital and other speakers stressed it was thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il, peerless elder statesman, that the DPRK could steadfastly advance along the road of socialism, remaining unfazed by the imperialists' moves to stifle it and that it is the world's only country standing firm against the U.S. They praised him as distinguished thinker and theoretician and genius of military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated at the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" on Dec. 11.
					 T. N. Esikova, chairwoman of the branch, was elected chairwoman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to organize a seminar, book exhibition and other political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Personages
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting and book and photo exhibition took place in Russia on Dec. 10 under the sponsorship of the Russian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the event were photos documenting the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and other books, and pictures introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, in a report said that Kim Jong Il was the great thinker and theoretician and distinguished statesman who developed and enriched the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung and applied it to the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Kapto, chairman of the Russian Public Circles Committee for Liaison with the DPRK, in his speech noted that Kim Jong Il instilled into the Korean people the conviction in victory of socialism and left the powerful state, people's power and invincible revolutionary armed forces as legacies.
					
					 Matsegora, deputy director of the Foreign Ministry of Russia, stressed that Kim Jong Il performed great feats for the development of the party, army and state of the DPRK.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Public Circles Committee for Liaison with the DPRK, Foreign Ministry, Korean War Veterans' Council, Institute of Oriental Studies of the Academy of Sciences and the Korean Koryo Medical Centre and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Washington's Retraction of Hostile Policy toward DPRK Urged by US Organization
articles.content:
Washington's Retraction of Hostile Policy toward DPRK Urged by US Organization
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Americans' national council for peace movement released an article on Dec. 9 urging the U.S. Administration to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Blaming the administration for having enforced severe hostile policy toward the DPRK in a bid to stifle it by all means and methods, the statement said:
					
					 We demand the administration stop posing a threat of aggression and slapping sanctions against the DPRK and retract its hostile policy toward the latter. 
					
					 If harsh sanctions and hostility are removed to be followed by conclusion of a peace treaty between the U.S. and the DPRK, peace and reunification will be achieved on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion con motivo del 3o aniversario de deceso de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion con motivo del 3o aniversario de deceso de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del deceso (17 de diciembre) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) hizo publica el dia 15 una informacion sobre la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente y sus indelebles hazanas que se hicieron eternos patrimonios nacionales.
					Percatado de la voluntad revolucionaria y deseo del ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio sabiamente las labores para glorificar la idea y las hazanas del lider antecesor, comenzo la informacion y continuo:
					
					Durante los ultimos 3 anos, el Mariscal escribio muchas obras clasicas, en las cuales dilucido el camino para llevar a feliz termino la causa de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					En IV Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y en el quinto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, hizo elegir al Dirigente como eterno Secretario General del PTC y eterno Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Y fue proclamada la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como maximo programa del PTC.
					
					El Palacio del Sol Kumsusan fue acondicionado como gran monumento a la eternidad de los lideres y fueron erguidos en la colina Mansu y otros lugares las estatuas de bronces del Dirigente y los retratos de los Generalisimos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					Kim Jong Un consolido extraordinariamente la unidad monolitica dejada por el Dirigente como la mas preciosa herencia de revolucion.
					
					Con motivo de la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula y la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos, del PTC, fue consolidada la base organizativa e ideologica del partido, reafirmada la importancia de las labores ideologicas y preparado el jalon de cambio trascendental en las mismas.
					
					La consigna "!Todo para el pueblo y todo apoyandose en las masas populares!" devino el punto de partida de todas las actividades del PTC.
					
					El amor al pueblo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un se ha materializado en sus visitas de orientacion a todas partes del pais que se totalizan en cientos de veces.
					
					En acato a la linea del PTC sobre la revolucion del Songun, se abrio la era dorada de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea visito el primero de enero del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche la  Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC y expuso la voluntad de emprender hasta el final el camino de Songun recorrido por el Dirigente en toda su vida.
					
					Hizo convertir todas las companias y batallones del EPC en las casas natales de los militares colindadas con el patio del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Al decir que la guerra estalla sin anuncio previo, levanto en todo el ejercito la oleada de ejercicios por el estilo de la guerrilla antijaponesa del monte Paektu y dio auge a la campana para prepararse como tiradores y artilleros certeros.
					
					Se han elevado a la nueva etapa mas alta la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la informatizacion de la industria de defensa nacional. 
					
					Al presentarse en el historico pleno de marzo del 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la nueva linea estrategica del desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, se hizo posible defender para siempre la dignidad independiente de la Corea del Songun y producir grandes saltos e innovaciones en la construccion de potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Kim Jong Un presento la ciencia y la tecnica como uno de 3 pilares de la construccion de un Estado prospero conforme al proposito del Dirigente y dinamizo la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo.
					
					Gracias al lanzamiento exitoso en el 12 de diciembre de 2012 de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" hecho con materiales nacionales, se ha consolidado la posicion de fabricador y lanzador del satelite artificial a la que llego la RPDC a cambio de ingentes esfuerzos de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se han registrado grandes innovaciones en la rama de construccion y se ha dado gran auge en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista.
					
					En correspondencia al llamamiento patriotico del Mariscal, se creo la "velocidad Masikryong", la de Corea, y se levantaron el Campo de Esqui del monte Masik y otras creaciones monumentales como simbolos del pais civilizado socialista.
					
					Se han registrado innovaciones en el sector agricola, el avanzado en la defensa del socialismo y el principal de la construccion de potencia economica.
					
					Comenzo la historia de abundantes capturas en los mares de Corea y se logra cambio revolucionario en la administracion del territorio nacional.
					
					Se ha aplicado la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos que muestra la noble concepcion del partido sobre la patria, las generaciones venideras y el futuro y se acelera la formacion de todos como cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Continuando la tradicion de la revolucion literaria y artistica del siglo 20, la Banda Moranbong conduce la marcha general por gran auge demostrando el aspecto del arte del Juche en constante desarrollo.
					
					Durante 3 anos pasados, los deportistas coreanos izaron la bandera nacional de la RPDC conquistando mas de 400 medallas de oro en mas de 200 competencias internacionales.
					
					A traves de la lucha de 3 anos pasados, se ha corroborado que la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la linea vital para la revolucion coreana y nadie puede impedir la marcha general de la RPDC que avanza por la senda de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.

articles.title: Ofrecida escena de recordacion de jovenes y estudiantes
articles.content:
Ofrecida escena de recordacion de jovenes y estudiantes
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se ofrecio el dia 15 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la escena de recordacion de los jovenes y estudiantes "Quedaremos fieles de generacion en generacion".
					 En la escena iniciada con la narracion y el coro del inmortal himno revolucionario "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il", los ejecutantes recordaron la vida revolucionaria del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, se refirio a las hazanas del Dirigente quien formo a los jovenes coreanos como reservas politicas fidedignas del Partido y gran destacamento de los sucesores de la revolucion.
					
					  El presidente del comite de administracion de la Cooperativa Pesquera de Sinuiju, Ko Song Uk, el director del Comite de Educacion, Yun Hui Sop, y el secretario de la organizacion primaria del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en el Comite de Gestion de Granjas Cooperativas del distrito de Onchon, Ri Hye Song, subrayaron que la antorcha de la revolucion entregada por el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il enciende mas furiosamente como llamarada de fidelidad en cada corazon de millones de vanguardistas juveniles.
					
					 Los Heroes del Trabajo, Han Pok Gil, Jang Yong Phal, Song Rak Un y Choe Yong Gu destacaron que el amor y la confianza del Dirigente han sido la fuente principal para que los jovenes creen los milagros y proezas en todos los campos del gran auge socialista.
					
					 Conmovieron el alma de los espectadores los cuentos emocionantes del presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Pak Song Chol, el estudiante del mismo plantel docente, Ri Kum Song, la obrera de la Fabrica de Calzados de Sinuiju, Kim Myong Hui, la estudiante de la Universidad Politica Kumsong, O Ye Gyong, la alumna de la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Wonphyong del distrito de Kumya, Ryu So Gum, la alumna de la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Sodu del distrito de Taehongdan, Min Hong Dan, el alumno de la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Sungri del Municipio de Rakrang, Ri Kyong Yon, la alumna de la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, Ri Chuk Bok, la obrera de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, Kim Jong Hyang, la conferenciante-jefa de la Empresa de Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Songhung, Rim Sun Gum, la campesina de la Granja Cooperativa de Sinam del distrito de Ryongchon, Kim Yong Hui,  la obrera
					
					  de la Fabrica Textil de Sariwon, O Myong Chun, el jefe de la Brigada de Choque Juvenil Ri Su Bok de la Mina Carbonifera de Tokchon, Pyon Yong Nam, y el estudiante de la Universidad Kim Po Hyon, Ri Chol Ho.
					
					  El presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la ciudad de Pyongyang, Mun Chol, el titular de la Direccion de Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad, Kim Yong Chol, el presidente del Comite Basico de la UJS en la Fabrica Productora No.111 de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Kim Yong Il, el jefe de la Brigada de Choque Juvenil Cha Kwang Su de la Mina Carbonifera de Hoe-an, Ri Song Hun, el presidente del Comite Basico de UJS en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon, Kwak Chol Song, el presidente de la organizacion primaria de la UJS en la Almaciga Central, Jo Hyon Chol y la jugadora de ping-pong del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril, Kim Jong, expresaron la decision de enaltecer eternamente a los grandes Generalisimos como Sol de Juche y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun de Juche uniendose en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el secretario responsable del Comite de la ciudad de Pyongyang del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Su Gik, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du y otros funcionarios de la rama interesada y la Union de la Juventud, las personas entrevistadas  con el Dirigente, los relacionados con sus actividades revolucionarias, jovenes y estudiantes.

articles.title: Efectuado mitin de juramento de obreros y gremiales
articles.content:
Efectuado mitin de juramento de obreros y gremiales
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 3o aniversario del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Central de Obreros el mitin de juramento de obreros y gremiales para enaltecer al Dirigente como eterno lider del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo y para seguir fielmente la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente.
					
					En la ocasion Hyon Sang Ju, presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, presento el informe y otras personas hicieron intervenciones de juramento.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron las hazanas del Dirigente quien dedico toda su abnegacion y esfuerzo para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Dieron destaque a que el Dirigente presento a los obreros como grueso y vanguardia de la construccion de un Estado prospero y dirigio sabiamente para que ellos cumplieran su honrosa mision y deber indicando claramente en cada periodo del desarrollo de la revolucion el camino a seguir la FGSC.
					
					Tomaron la decision de llevar a feliz termino el deseo y el proyecto de toda la vida del Dirigente bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Exhortaron a todos a glorificar para siempre la vida revolucionaria y las hazanas del Dirigente y adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche en acato fiel a la direccion del Songun del Mariscal.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en el acto Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del PTC, funcionarios de la FGSC, obreros y gremiales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il abrio nueva epoca de reunificacion de patria, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il abrio nueva epoca de reunificacion de patria, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo una indeleble proeza patriotica en la historia nacional al presentar como bandera del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", y continua:
					Este ideal materializa la idea de independencia nacional del Dirigente siendo producto de su noble amor a la patria, la nacion y el pueblo.
					
					Se ha engendrado gracias a la sabia direccion del Generalisimo quien establecio con firmeza el caracter juche de la causa de reunificacion de la patria y promovio la unidad y la reunificacion frustrando con el poderio de independencia nacional los desafios de las fuerzas divisionistas internas y externas.
					
					"Entre nosotros, los connacionales" es la expresion de la orgullosa epoca del 15 de Junio por la reunificacion que refleja la autoctona concepcion de la nacion y la reunificacion del Dirigente, maximo representante del espiritu de independencia nacional.
					
					Despues de publicada la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio fundamentada en el ideal mencionado, todos los coreanos, inclusive los habitantes surcoreanos, expresaron su infinita veneracion a el.
					
					Presentar como invariable programa la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, frutos de la voluntad patriotica del Dirigente, y lograr bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" la causa de reunificacion independiente son la voluntad unanime de todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar.
